original_text: he broke down the altars and beat the Asherim and the images into powder and cut down all the incense altars throughout all the land of Israel. Then he returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 제단들을 허물며 아세라 목상들과 아로새긴 우상들을 빻아 가루를 만들며 온 이스라엘 땅에 있는 모든 태양상을 찍고 예루살렘으로 돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: and beat the Asherim and the images into powder
and cut down all the incense altars
throughout all the land of Israel
